product_name: REI Sariska Stretch Woven Pants - Women's
long_description: Perfect for yoga outdoors or at the club, our women's REI Sariska Stretch Woven pants move beautifully and cover completely. Stretch-woven polyester and spandex fabric offers 4-way stretch; a broad, flexible ribbed waist also provides comfort as you move. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip hand pockets provide secure storage for essentials. Drawstrings at waist and cuffs let you fine-tune the fit. REI Sariska Stretch Woven pants for women have a modern rise and an active fit that provides a full range of motion.
short_description: Perfect for yoga outdoors or at the club, our women's REI Sariska Stretch Woven pants move beautifully and cover completely.
